org.aludratest.doxia.mediawiki
Class MediaWikiSiteModule

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.doxia.module.site.AbstractSiteModule
      org.aludratest.doxia.mediawiki.MediaWikiSiteModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.doxia.module.site.SiteModule
@Component(role=org.apache.maven.doxia.module.site.SiteModule.class,
           hint="mediawiki")
public class MediaWikiSiteModule
extends org.apache.maven.doxia.module.site.AbstractSiteModule

Doxia site module for MediaWiki sources. All sources must be located under the mediawiki folder and have an mediawiki file extension.

Field Summary

          File extension for MediaWiki sources.
